title: Half-palette
description: Half-palette definition for use with Go Dependency Visualizer (github.com/samlitowitz/godepvis)

packageName.description: Accepts hex (`#ff0000`), rgb (`rgb(255,0,0)`), and rgba (`rgba(255,0,0,0)`) formatted strings.
